AnalyticMethod.description: Metadata of analytical methods used to obtain chemical and physical data.

analytic_method.description: Unique short name of analytical method.
analytic_method.title: Analytic Method

digestion_method.description: Digestion methods used in analytical methods.
digestion_method.title: Digestion Method

AnalyticMethod.title: AnalyticMethod

AnalyticMethodBiblio.description: Metadata of references for analytical methods used to obtain chemical data.

analytic_method_pub_id.description: Unique author identifiers for analytic method publications.
analytic_method_pub_id.title: Analytic Method Pub Id

reference_pub_id.description: Reference identifiers for analytic method publications.
reference_pub_id.title: Reference Pub Id

analytic_method.description: Analytical method abbreviations, refers to field ANALYTIC_METHOD of AnalyticalMethod table.
analytic_method.title: Analytic Method

media.description: Analyzed media types for analytic method publications.
media.title: Media

pub_year.description: Year of analytic method publication. Min: 1947, Max: 2017, Units: year
pub_year.title: Pub Year

pub_citation.description: Bibliographic citation for analytic method publication; may refer to chapter or section of publication.
pub_citation.title: Pub Citation

pub_url.description: URL of analytical method publication, if available.
pub_url.title: Pub Url

AnalyticMethodBiblio.title: AnalyticMethodBiblio

CoordinatesQualifier.description: Metadata of qualifier codes for the precision of geographic coordinates.

coordinates_qual.description: Qualifier code regarding precision of coordinates gained using GIS. Value 1-5.
coordinates_qual.title: Coordinates Qual

estimated_accuracy.description: Estimated positional accuracy of geospatial coordinates resolved by project.
estimated_accuracy.title: Estimated Accuracy

CoordinatesQualifier.title: CoordinatesQualifier

id.description: Internal ID of the point. CMIBS Sample ID.
id.title: Id

geometry.description: Geometry of this feature, expressed as Lat Long in geographic coordinates.
geometry.title: Geometry

geology.description: Associated geologic data of the sample.

whole_rock_majors_best_value.description: Table of 'best value' chemical 'whole rock' major element data for rock, sediment, soil and organic samples.

whole_rock_others_best_value.description: Table of 'best value' chemical 'whole rock' data of other various elements, compounds and physical measurements for rock, sediment, soil and organic samples.

MapTile.description: A tile representing geologic map information covering a small area.
MapTile.title: MapTile

Mineral_BestValueData.description:
Table of 'best value' chemical data for rock, sediment, soil and organic samples.
Values listed as optional due to some elements being measured in ppm and others as a percent, and not all elements
having measurements.

cmibs_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to each sample entered in the CMIBS geochemical database; foreign key from Geology table.
cmibs_id.title: Cmibs Id

mineral_ppm.description: Parts per million of target mineral for best model.
mineral_ppm.title: Mineral Ppm

mineral_pct.description: Best value of target mineral in weight percent.
mineral_pct.title: Mineral Pct

mineral_ppm_all.description: Parts per million of target mineral for all models.
mineral_ppm_all.title: Mineral Ppm All

mineral_pct_all.description: All values of target mineral in weight percent.
mineral_pct_all.title: Mineral Pct All

Mineral_BestValueData.title: Mineral_BestValueData

SampleAnalyticData.description:
Metadata of descriptive and analytical attributes for rock, sediment, soil and organic samples.
Many fields may be optional.

field_id.description: Field identifiers assigned by the sample collector of samples submitted for analysis.
field_id.title: Field Id

lab_id.description: Laboratory batch identifiers assigned by the Sample Control Officers of the analytical laboratories that received the samples as batches.
lab_id.title: Lab Id

job_id.description: Unique identifiers assigned to submitted samples by the Sample Control Officer of the analytical laboratory that received the samples.
job_id.title: Job Id

submitter.description: Names of the individuals who submitted samples in batches to the laboratories for analysis.
submitter.title: Submitter

project_name.description: Project names, at times derived from project account numbers, of work groups funded for the collection and analysis of submitted samples.
project_name.title: Project Name

date_submitted.description: Date sample was submitted to Sample Control for initial database processing prior to sample prep and analysis; or date sample and its data were added to the database from non-USGS sources; in the format mm/dd/yyyy.
date_submitted.title: Date Submitted

method_collected.description: Sample collection method: single grab, composite, or channel.
method_collected.title: Method Collected

previous_job_id.description: Original NGDB batch numbers (JOB_ID) of USGS resubmitted samples that have been given new batch numbers upon resubmittal for further analysis.
previous_job_id.title: Previous Job Id

previous_lab_id.description: Original NGDB LAB_IDs of USGS resubmitted samples that have been given new lab numbers upon resubmittal for further analysis.
previous_lab_id.title: Previous Lab Id

publ_id.description: Identifiers for publications that are sources of data, or where data is cited.
publ_id.title: Publ Id

data_source.description: Identifiers for other sources of data; databases, publications, individuals.
data_source.title: Data Source

SampleAnalyticData.title: SampleAnalyticData

SampleData.description: Metadata of spatial, geologic and descriptive attributes for rock, sediment, soil and organic samples.

cmibs_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to each sample entered in the CMIBS geochemical database.
cmibs_id.title: Cmibs Id

analytics.description: Data related to the analytic methods for obtaining and processing the sample.

location.description: Data related ot the location of the sample.

geologic.description: Data related to the specific geology of the sample.

SampleData.title: SampleData

SampleGeologicData.description: Metadata of geologic attributes for rock, sediment, soil and organic samples. Many fields may be optional.

sample_source.description: Physical settings or environments from which the samples were collected.
sample_source.title: Sample Source

secondary_class.description: Secondary classifications or subclasses of sample media.
secondary_class.title: Secondary Class

sample_comment.description: Attributes used to modify PRIMARY_CLASS, SECONDARY_CLASS, or SPECIFIC_NAME.
sample_comment.title: Sample Comment

addl_attr.description: Additional attributes used to modify PRIMARY_CLASS, SECONDARY_CLASS, or SPECIFIC_NAME.
addl_attr.title: Addl Attr

geologic_age.description: Ages or ranges of ages from the Geological Time Scale for the collected samples.
geologic_age.title: Geologic Age

stratigraphy.description: Names of the stratigraphic units from which samples were collected.
stratigraphy.title: Stratigraphy

strat_grp.description: Summary field of formations, groups or supergroups for entries in STRATIGRAPHY.
strat_grp.title: Strat Grp

start_sort.description: Summary field for entries in STRATIGRAPHY.
start_sort.title: Start Sort

regional_geology.description: Regional geologic settings of stratigraphic units.
regional_geology.title: Regional Geology

tectonic_setting.description: Tectonic settings for deposition of stratigraphic units.
tectonic_setting.title: Tectonic Setting

source_terrain.description: Tectonic terrains as sources of deposition for stratigraphic units.
source_terrain.title: Source Terrain

mineralizaton.description: Indications of mineralization or mineralization types as provided by sample submitters.
mineralizaton.title: Mineralizaton

alteration.description: Indications of the presence or types of alteration noted in samples by submitters.
alteration.title: Alteration

SampleGeologicData.title: SampleGeologicData

SampleLocationData.description: Metadata of spatial attributes for rock, sediment, soil and organic samples. Many fields may be optional.

country.description: Countries or marine bodies of water from where samples were collected.
country.title: Country

state_province.description: Countries or marine bodies of water from where samples were collected.
state_province.title: State Province

quad.description: Names of 1:250,000-scale quadrangles (1-degree x 2-degree or 1-degree by 3-degree) in which samples were collected.
quad.title: Quad

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of sample site, reported in decimal degrees; see metadata for further datum and spheroid information.
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of sample site, reported in decimal degrees; there are sites on both sides of the International Date Line; see metadata for further datum and spheroid information.
longitude.title: Longitude

spheroid.description: Reference spheroids or ellipsoids, when recorded, for the latitude and longitude coordinates of the sample sites.
spheroid.title: Spheroid

datum.description: Reference datums, when recorded, for the latitude and longitude coordinates of the sample sites.
datum.title: Datum

coordinates_qual.description: Qualifier code regarding precision of coordinates gained using GIS. Not all samples have the code if they weren’t determined by GIS analysis.

coordinates_comment.description: Comments regarding precision of geospatial coordinates.
coordinates_comment.title: Coordinates Comment

locate_desc.description: Geographic information relating to the locations of the sample sites.
locate_desc.title: Locate Desc

depth.description: Depths from the surface at which samples were collected; units are specified by the submitter and included with the values.
depth.title: Depth

SampleLocationData.title: SampleLocationData

WholeRockMajors_BestValueData.description: Table of 'best value' chemical 'whole rock' major element data for rock, sediment, soil and organic samples.

cmibs_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to each sample entered in the CMIBS geochemical database; foreign key from Geology table.
cmibs_id.title: Cmibs Id

wr_qual.description: Qualifier for whole rock analysis, from 1 to 6, where 1 is the most precise analytical method package with the best sample digestion, and 6 is the least.
wr_qual.title: Wr Qual

wr_def.description: Definition of qualifier for whole rock analysis.
wr_def.title: Wr Def

compoundmajor_pct.description: Best value in weight percent of whole rock majority.
compoundmajor_pct.title: Compoundmajor Pct

compoundmajor_pct_all.description: All values in weight percent of whole rock majority.
compoundmajor_pct_all.title: Compoundmajor Pct All

WholeRockMajors_BestValueData.title: WholeRockMajors_BestValueData

WholeRockOthers_BestValueData.description:
Table of 'best value' chemical 'whole rock' data of other various elements, compounds and physical measurements
for rock, sediment, soil and organic samples

cmibs_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to each sample entered in the CMIBS geochemical database; foreign key from Geology table.
cmibs_id.title: Cmibs Id

loi_pct.description: Loss on ignition as 'best value', in weight percent. Negative values indicate concentrations less than the lower limit of determination for the analytical method. The absolute value of the negative number is the lower limit of determination. A null or empty cell means not analyzed. LOI first at 600 to 650 degrees centegrade, LOI second at 900 to 950 degrees centegrade.
loi_pct.title: Loi Pct

loi_pct_all.description: Loss on ignition, at 600 to 650 or 900 to 950 degrees centigrade, all values, in weight percent, and their analytical methods, from best method to least, as concatenations.
loi_pct_all.title: Loi Pct All

compound_pct.description: Other compound, as 'best value', in weight percent. Negative values indicate concentrations less than the lower limit of determination for the analytical method. The absolute value of the negative number is the lower limit of determination. A null (or empty cell) means not analyzed.
compound_pct.title: Compound Pct

compound_pct_am.description: Analytical methods used for 'best values' of other compound.

compound_pct_all.description: Other compound, all values, in weight percent, and their analytical methods, from best method to least, as concatenations.
compound_pct_all.title: Compound Pct All

dop_si.description: Degree of pyritization, as a calculation FePyr(FePyr + FeHCl), as 'best value', in standard units. Negative values indicate concentrations less than the lower limit of determination for the analytical method. The absolute value of the negative number is the lower limit of determination. A null (or empty cell) means not analyzed for the species.
dop_si.title: Dop Si

dop_am.description: Degree of pyritization, analytical method used for 'best value'; see ANALYTIC_METHOD field of AnalyticMethod table for method description.

dop_si_all.description: Degree of pyritization, all values, in weight percent, and their analytical methods, from best method to least, as a concatenation.
dop_si_all.title: Dop Si All

varDensity_gcc.description: Variable 'Bulk' or 'Powder' density, as 'best value', in grams per cubic centimeter. A null (or empty cell) means not analyzed for the species.
varDensity_gcc.title: Vardensity Gcc

varDensity_am.description: Variable 'Bulk' or 'Powder' density, analytical method used for 'best value'.

varDensity_gcc_all.description: Variable 'Bulk' or 'Powder' density, all values, in grams per cubic centimeter, and their analytical methods, from best method to least, as a concatenation.
varDensity_gcc_all.title: Vardensity Gcc All

satind_si.description: Saturation index, as 'best value', in standard units. A null (or empty cell) means not analyzed for the species.
satind_si.title: Satind Si

satind_am.description: Saturation index, analytical method used for 'best value.'

satind_si_all.description: Saturation index, all values, in standard units, and their analytical methods, from best method to least, as a concatenation.
satind_si_all.title: Satind Si All

tmax_degC.description: Temperature at which the maximum release of hydrocarbons occurs during pyrolysis, as 'best value', in degrees Centigrade. A null (or empty cell) means not analyzed for the species.
tmax_degC.title: Tmax Degc

tmax_am.description: Temperature at which the maximum release of hydrocarbons occurs during pyrolysis, analytical methods used for 'best values.'

tmax_degC_all.description: Temperature at which the maximum release of hydrocarbons occurs during pyrolysis, all values, in weight percent, and their analytical methods, from best method to least, as concatenations.
tmax_degC_all.title: Tmax Degc All

sVar_mgg.description: S1. Free hydrocarbons in the sample,  S2.Hydrocarbons generated through thermal cracking of nonvolatile organic matter, or  S3. Carbon dioxide produced during pyrolysis of kerogen, as 'best value', in milligrams of S1-2. hydrocarbon or S3. carbon dioxide per gram of rock. Negative values indicate concentrations less than the lower limit of determination for the analytical method. The absolute value of the negative number is the lower limit of determination. A null (or empty cell) means not analyzed for the species.
sVar_mgg.title: Svar Mgg

sVar_mgg_all.description: All values for S1, S2, S3, in weight percent, and their analytical methods, from best method to least,as concatenations.
sVar_mgg_all.title: Svar Mgg All

var_ratio.description: Hydrogen index (hi), or oxygen index (oi), or production index (pi), as 'best value', in milligrams of hi: hydrocarbons [100 x S2] (hi), oi: carbon dioxide [100 x S3],pi: [S1] hydrocarbons milligrams of [S1 + S2] hydrocarbons, per gram of total organic carbon. A null (or empty cell) means not analyzed for the species.
var_ratio.title: Var Ratio

var_ratio_all.description: Hydrogen index (in weight percent), oxygen index (in parts per million), or production index (in weight percent), all values, in weight percent, and their analytical methods, from best method to least, as concatenations.
var_ratio_all.title: Var Ratio All

WholeRockOthers_BestValueData.title: WholeRockOthers_BestValueData

bounds.description: Bounding box of the tile scheme.
bounds.title: Bounds

crs.description: Coordinate reference system of the tile scheme.
crs.title: Crs

tile_size.description: Size of the tiles in the scheme.
tile_size.title: Tile Size

tiles.description: List of tiles in the scheme.
tiles.title: Tiles
